name: PAPAL MURDER At the Vatican Games
name_original: PAPAL MURDER At the Vatican Games
description:
WELCOME HOLY AGENT

You are a holy agent, working for the evil anti-pope, Bouef Jesus. He has tasked you with entering the Holy Vatican Games (Totally not the Olympics) and assassinating the good pope. 

FEATURES

  • ROW!!! You are in a rowing contest, so I hope you have the stamina!!
  • SNIPER ACTION! Use your sniper rifle to take out targets before they catch on to your evil wrong doings. 
  • ROW SNIPING! Yes, you can snipe while rowing your boat. 
  • DECISIONS!!! No SPOILERS!!
  • SO MANY JOE BIDENS! We had to nerf the power of Joe Biden in this game. We are unable to comment on the reasons this was enforced. 
  • LORE! Read up on the fascinating history of this alternate world

Credits

This game was made with love by Team PGMM, for Paint Jam 2021.

  • Marlijn - Design, Programming, 3D Art
  • Maxwell - Programming, 3D & Some 2D Art
  • Gossamer - 2D Art, Voice acting, Sounds, Writing
  • Prisma - 2D Art
